WorkItem.ClosedComment: This appears to be a Blizzard bug, not a Rawr bug.
WorkItem.Description: I have attached a screenshot showing stamina calculation in the Prot Paladin mod to be off.

Comments.Message:
10g says it's a missing socket bonus.

Can you post your character file?

I checked vs. the Armory, and I cannot explain why Rawr is coming up 6 short here.  Your base health is correct, 141 * 1.1448 is about 161.  Your items have 2770 stamina on them.  2770 * 1.1448 is about 3171.  3171 + 161 = 3332.  Yet your toon is reporting 3338.

You might want to try to pinpoint the problem by removing items, one at a time, from both your toon and from Rawr, and see where the discrepancy is.  If it's gradual, that means there's a rounding error somewhere.  But if one item is the problem, we can look into fixing that item.

I pulled another toon and it did not have any stamina issue.

Here's the character file.  I noted that there does indeed seem to be a discrepancy with Nexus War Champion Beads.  

I will be able to take it apart item by item sometime this evening and see what the results are.

I switched to my ret spec to simplify calculation and checked stam given by Nexus War Champion Beads.  Ingame, it is giving me 6 stamina more than it should be.  I should be receiving 145 stam from it, I'm getting 151.

Interesting, because the socket bonus on that is +6 stamina.  The socket is red and the gem is blue, you shouldn't be getting the bonus.  But here we are.

Seemes Elitist Jerks has identified this as a bug with Blizzard: http://www.mmo-champion.com/class-warrior/15-stam-100-hp/msg1284561/#msg1284561  Basically, any gear you had socketed with a Solid Dragon's Eye before patch 3.2's change to make dragon's eyes no longer prismatic are still acting as though they are prismatic.
Did I say Elitist Jerks?  I meant MMO Champion.  Oops.
